title: The New York State Sheep and Wool Festival Draws Younger Fans
description: The New York State Sheep and Wool Festival, long home to 4-H clubs and livestock hawkers, is drawing new attendees.
dc:creator: Rose Adams
media:credit: Mary Inhea Kang for The New York Times
media:description: Sabrina Brokenborough wore head-to-ankle avant-garde knitwear of her own design to the New York State Sheep and Wool Festival.
